alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 29 at 3:36AM MDT until October 29 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 11 inches. * WHERE...Fremont County below 8500 feet, the Wet Mountain Valley below 8500 feet, El Paso and Pueblo Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult especially along Highway 50 and Interstate 25.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
